title: Instructional Design Expert Course for Online Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental online learning platform management skills and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in designing social domain curricula for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: The OLM framework can be applied to design the structure and content layout of online learning modules.
Three or more interactive elements can be implemented to enhance learner engagement in an LMS-based learning environment.
Accessibility-optimized learning materials can be created using various digital devices.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
